command.script:
#!/bin/bash set -e # Temporary folder where projects archives will be saved temporarily if [ -d $RD_OPTION_TMP_FOLDER ] then echo -e "
Temporary Directory already exists
" else mkdir -p $RD_OPTION_TMP_FOLDER echo -e "
Temporary directory created
" fi # Loop to get projects names for project in $(curl -s --location --request GET "$RD_OPTION_URL/api/21/projects" --header 'Accept: application/json' --header "X-Rundeck-Auth-Token: $RD_OPTION_TOKEN" | jq -r .[].name) do
echo -e "-Retrieving project $project configuration file
" cmd=$(curl -s -k -X "GET" "$RD_OPTION_URL/api/21/project/$project/config" --header "Accept: application/json" --header "content-type: application/json" --header "x-rundeck-auth-token:$RD_OPTION_TOKEN" --output "$RD_OPTION_TMP_FOLDER/$project.conf") sleep 2;
echo -e "-Temporal project file" echo -e "$RD_OPTION_TMP_FOLDER/$project.conf
" sleep 2;
echo -e "-Changing node executor to OpenSsh
" data=$(cat $RD_OPTION_TMP_FOLDER/$project.conf | jq -r .| sed 's/sshj-ssh/ssh-exec/g');
echo -e "-Query:
" curl -s --location --request PUT "$RD_OPTION_URL/api/21/project/$project/config" --header 'Accept: application/json' --header 'Content-Type: application/json' --header "X-Rundeck-Auth-Token: $RD_OPTION_TOKEN" -d "$data"
echo -e "
-------------------------------------------
"
done
